name: Timer

inputs.name: Duration
inputs.description: The total number of seconds that the timer counts

outputs.name: Started
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the timer starts

outputs.name: Tick
outputs.description: Executes the next node each frame

outputs.name: Completed
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the timer stops

outputs.name: Elapsed Time
outputs.description: The number of seconds elapsed since the timer started

outputs.name: Progress
outputs.description: The proportion of the duration that has elapsed. Value range: 0 to 1

outputs.name: Remaining
outputs.description: The number of seconds remaining until the timer stops

description: Use a timer to manage different executions.
